text: The 2018 Pan American Track Cycling Championships took place at the Aguascalientes Bicentenary Velodrome, in Aguascalientes, Mexico, from August 29 until September 2, 2018. The event served as a qualifier for the 2019 Pan American Games. ==Medal summary== ===Men=== {| |- |Sprint | | | |- |1 km time trial | | | |- |Keirin | | | |- |Scratch | | | |- |Points race | | | |- |Individual pursuit | | | |- |Omnium | | | |- |Madison | Daniel Holloway Adrian Hegyvary | Ignacio Sarabia José Aguirre | Felipe Penaloza Antonio Cabrera |- |Team sprint | Kwesi Browne Njisane Phillip Nicholas Paul | Rubén Murillo Santiago Ramírez Kevin Quintero | Flávio Cipriano Kacio Freitas João Vitor da Silva |- |Team pursuit | Ashton Lambie Eric Young Colby Lange Gavin Hoover | Juan Arango Brayan Sánchez Carlos Tobon Marvin Angarita | José Aguirre Ignacio Prado Edibaldo Maldonado Ignacio Sarabia |} ===Women=== {| |- |Sprint | | | |- |500 m time trial | | | |- |Keirin | | | |- |Individual pursuit | | | |- |Points race | | | |- |Scratch | | | |- |Omnium | | | |- |Madison | Yarely Salazar Sofía Arreola | Allison Beveridge Atephanie Roorda | Kimberly Geist Christina Birch |- |Team sprint | Luz Gaxiola Yuli Verdugo Jessica Salazar |valign=top| Mandy Marquardt Madalyn Godby |valign=top| Lauriane Genest Amelia Walsh |- |Team pursuit | Jennifer Valente Kimberly Geist Kelly Catlin Christina Birch | Yarely Salazar Ana Teresa Casas Jessica Bonilla Brenda Santoyo | Maggie Coles-Lyster Laurie Jussaume Devaney Collier Miriam Brouwer |} ==Medal table== ==References== ==External links== *Results book Category:Pan American Road and Track Championships Americas Cycling Category:International sports competitions hosted by Mexico Category:Sport in Aguascalientes Category:August 2018 sports events in Mexico Category:September 2018 sports events in Mexico Category:Qualification tournaments for the 2019 Pan American Games
title: 2018 Pan American Track Cycling Championships
